Label.en: They were horrified when it moved, then horrified again when it was decided that the Baltard Pavilions would be destroyed!
Label.fr: Ils ont été horrifiés une première fois quand le marché est parti, puis à nouveau quand les pavillons Baltard on été détruits !
Label.es: They were horrified when it moved, then horrified again when it was decided that the Baltard Pavilions would be destroyed!
Label.zh: They were horrified when it moved, then horrified again when it was decided that the Baltard Pavilions would be destroyed!

Label.en: In the relocation, many rats were moved too... so it wasn't all bad!
Label.fr: Il y avait pourtant du positif, pas mal de rats ont déménagé en même temps !
Label.es: In the relocation, many rats were moved too... so it wasn't all bad!
Label.zh: In the relocation, many rats were moved too... so it wasn't all bad!

Label.en: Regardless... the area was deserted in a matter of days, and all the stalls moved to the new location: Rungis
Label.fr: Mais bon...la zone fût désertée en quelques jours, et les commerces transplantés au sud de Paris, à Rungis
Label.es: Regardless... the area was deserted in a matter of days, and all the stalls moved to the new location: Rungis
Label.zh: Regardless... the area was deserted in a matter of days, and all the stalls moved to the new location: Rungis

Label.en: It gets worse... the digging soon began...
Label.fr: Seulement un avant-goût...quelques années plus tard l'excavation débuta
Label.es: It gets worse... the digging soon began...
Label.zh: It gets worse... the digging soon began...

Label.en: Well... it wasn't for long... once they started digging!
Label.fr: Seulement pour un bout de temps...quelque années plus tard l'excavation débuta !
Label.es: Well... it wasn't for long... once they started digging!
Label.zh: Well... it wasn't for long... once they started digging!
